    attack(Player) - Method in class logic.character.Berserker
    Attacks the specified player.
    attack(Player) - Method in class logic.character.Boss
    Executes one of three randomized actions: Boss.normalAttack(Player) — standard physical attack Boss.iceBeam(Player) — magical freezing attack with a 50% success chance Boss.regen() — restores 50 health
    attack(Player) - Method in class logic.character.Enemy
    Performs this enemy's attack behavior against the specified player.
    attack(Player) - Method in class logic.character.Mage
    Performs the Mage's magic attack against the player.
    attack(Player) - Method in class logic.character.Shaman
    Performs one of two random actions against the player: 1 → Shaman.normalAttack(Player) 2 → Shaman.iceBeam(Player)
    attack(Player) - Method in class logic.character.Slime
    Performs a simple physical attack against the player.
    attack(Player) - Method in class logic.character.SlimeKing
    Performs the Slime King's physical attack against the player.
    attack(Player) - Method in class logic.character.Warrior
    Performs the Warrior's physical attack on the player.
    Attack - Class in logic.cards
    A physical attack card that deals damage based on its rarity.
    Attack(int) - Constructor for class logic.cards.Attack
    Constructs an Attack card with the given rarity.
